attributes.action: cancel the award of the contract to Lockheed Martin to support the 2011 Census.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the 2001 Census (also supported by Lockheed Martin), the US Patriot Act has been introduced compelling personal data held by any company on systems in the US to be made available to government intelligence (without informing the people involved). 
The involvement of a US defence contractor, with clients within the intelligence community, in collecting and processing Census data, gives cause for concern about the security of personal data and will discourage people from giving accurate information.
